title: What actually is light in terms of atoms? - Quora

response.answer_text: Light in terms atoms is undefined. Actually it don't consist of atoms. Light is a strange mystery ever since centuries and even today! Light is imagined as having wave and particle nature both. when we talk about particle nature then light is composed of mass less particles called photons!! It's just an idea so as to get a picture of what we read in theories. Otherwise I believe in future this idea can easily be abandoned.
